page.name: Fujifilm X100V Portra Film Simulation Recipe

children.value: This is my take on the famous Portra film for the
. This recipe should also work for any Fujifilm camera with the X-Trans IV sensor.

Classic Chrome 


Grain Effect: Strong, Small Color 


Chrome Effect: Strong 


Color Chrome FX Blue: Weak 


White Balance: Auto, +3 Red & -5 Blue 


Dynamic Range Priority: Weak 


Color: +2 


Sharpness: -2 


Noise Reduction: -4 


Clarity: +2 


Highlight: 0 


Shadow: -2 


ISO: 400 


Exposure Compensation: +1/3 to +1
